scripts.seed: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { Client } = require('pg'); const config = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('database.json')); const client = new Client(config); const seedFiles = ['seeds/001_initial_seed.sql', 'seeds/002_analytics_seed.sql']; async function runSeeds() { await client.connect(); for (const file of seedFiles) { console.log('Running seed:', file); const seedSQL = fs.readFileSync(file, 'utf8'); await client.query(seedSQL); console.log('Completed:', file); } console.log('All seed data inserted successfully'); client.end(); } runSeeds().catch(err => { console.error(err); client.end(); process.exit(1); });"
